These child vaccinate infancy cluster-randomized Finnish Invasive pneumococcal Disease ( FinIP ) Trial ( separate protocol report ClinicalTrials.gov Identifier : NCT00861380 ) 2009 2011 . DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria FinIPvaccinated child : 1. age 3 5 year 2. enrol FinIP trial receive least one dose study vaccine infant vaccine schedule ( 3+1 2+1 ) 3. least one parent fluent Finnish 4. informed consent one parent Exclusion criterion FinIPvaccinated child 1 . PCV vaccination administer , randomize study vaccine 2. history antimicrobial treatment within 4 week ( child enrol later ) Inclusion criterion unvaccinated sibling 1. age 5 9 year 2. young sibling live household participate FinIP trial ( regardless vaccination schedule ) 3. least one parent fluent Finnish 4. informed consent one parent Exclusion criterion unvaccinated sibling 1 . PCV vaccination administer 2. history antimicrobial treatment within 4 week ( child enrol later )
